# Orleans observability

> Documentation for Orleans observability.

*Topics available: 3*

- [Client error code monitoring](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/monitoring/client-error-code-monitoring.md): Explore the various client error code monitoring values in .NET Orleans.
- [Orleans observability](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/monitoring/index.md): Explore the various runtime monitoring, logging, distributed tracing, and metrics options available in .NET Orleans.
- [Silo error code monitoring](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/monitoring/silo-error-code-monitoring.md): Explore the various silo error code monitoring values in .NET Orleans.
